name: qualot-berry
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases happiness by 10/5/2. Lowers Defense effort by 10.
short_effect: Drops Defense Effort Values by 10 and raises happiness.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow QUALOT.
flavor_text.emerald: Makes a POKéMON friendly but lowers base DEFENSE.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: Can be ground up into a powder as an ingredient for medicine.
